response.overview: Step into the delightful chaos of The Reel World, a comedy from Rebel Productions that invites you to follow the drama behind the drama.  The crew of the hit TV show Paradise Falls scrambles through the unpredictable landscape of daytime television, proving the off-camera antics are every bit as juicy as the scenes they shoot. Caught in the swirl of the tidal wave that is set, are a young director determined to make an impact, a flamboyant and eccentric Key PA, and a first AD that has a lot to learn about the hierarchy of this long running soap opera. We arent in LA anymore!
response.title: The Reel World
